website_summaries.verdict: A colorful and fun 3D world for up to 4 players playing cooperatively, or against each other.
pros: Features a wide variety of levels, secret worlds, and items to collect
Plays up to 4 players at a time, either cooperatively or competitively
cons: No split screen, which can make it hard to keep track of everyone in a multiplayer game
Some discs received didn't work with the Wii U console

customer_reviews.title: Great family game!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 7 year old children absolutely love this game. The challenge is perfect for their age, and my wife and I enjoy a few levels here and there as well. I prefer them not to use the gamepad since it's such in integral part of the Wii U, but this game does have a few levels that require it. That's the only drawback as a parent of some not-so-graceful children.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, but mis-labeled region copies are rampant
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to play this version of the game, but when I got it in it is the Malaysia / Singapore region of the game. Reading online it appears mixed if this will work in a US Wii U, so I am returning mine. I would rather buy used and know it is a legit copy of the game than have a new disc that may not work in system and then can't be returned. There as no mention on the detail page about the region disparity, barely even noticed when I removed from the package. On other hand it was delivered well and came in good condition. The game itself is a cool take on Mario with simultaneous multiplayer.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great Mario Game
customer_reviews.text: I have been playing Mario games my entire life dating back to the originals. This was a great new addition to the series. As an adult it was fun to travel through the bright colorful worlds and try to find all the stars. My children ages 2-7 love to run the level trying out all the different power ups, especially the cat suit. I loved playing this both on my own and with up to three other players all running around on the screen together.
customer_reviews.author: Mainah.Dad

customer_reviews.title: lot of levels to play and a lot of items to collect
customer_reviews.text: Good game. there are a lot of levels to play and a lot of items to collect. It's actually pretty challenging even for an adult, so you may want to consider that before buying, but its a very well done game with loads of content to keep you and up to 4 people playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't Think of Anything Better!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing game Nintendo has ever thought of! Going through a game like this is like going through a 5 year journey. It's easy and also hard, and has many secret worlds and levels to reveal! I definitely want a Super Mario 3D World 2!
customer_reviews.author: Paresh

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Super Mario Game that reminds me of the classics with a modern spin
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is now obsessed with this game! This is a great 1 to 4 player game and reminds me of Super Mario 3 that I spent hours playing as a child (Even has the same sound effects for things like losing a life). You can play individually or as a cooperative game but allows you to track individual performance when you play together. Has the ability to have 3 different saved games if you have multiple children (or Adults) who want to play their own game.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G

customer_reviews.title: Great game, must have for Wii U owners.
customer_reviews.text: Really great game! This was my first game that I bought for the Wii U and I'm almost always playing this or Pikmin 3. Love the graphics and the ability to use different characters. I still haven't tried to do any multiplayer gaming but hope to do that soon and update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best wii u game ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I bought a wifi u I always wanted to buy this game but at 60$ dollars? No thank you, but when Nintendo announced they were launching another batch of Nintendo selects I was hyped! Other then the excellent price this game is the best 4 player platformer I have ever played. Just get 3 buddies and get ready for a crazy ride! All the levels are huge and beautifully designed! And that cat power up adds a whole new level of interaction! If you have a wii u there is no excuse not to buy this
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Fun Update to a Classic
customer_reviews.text: The game play is similar to the classic Mario games, but with the 3D addition. It is nice to be able to have a long running game and add or drop players based on who is playing at the moment. I highly recommend using the controller with the screen. It has several special features to interface with the game that you cant do on the standard controller.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and a good family title
customer_reviews.text: I love playing this game with my nephew. The controls are smooth and the graphics are very crisp. You get to play as Princess Peach too. I think Super Mario Bro’s. Wii U is a better game. I still recommend Super Mario 3D World to Nintendo fans of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Harmonybee

customer_reviews.title: 90's gamer enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. Great blend of old Mario and 3D effects. Easy to figure out and play with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Best Mario game to date!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so good i had to buy 2 copies, well technically because my son broke the frist disc. This has to be one of the best Mario yet, well up to the wii u. 4 Player action, you can help or challenge your friends or family. All levels are fun and some very difficult, it's most have for the Wii U.
customer_reviews.author: GO DRAKEN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game that does the Mario Name Well
customer_reviews.text: It's a Nintendo select for a reason. The story and gameplay are amazing and the music is fantastic. It does justice to the mario name and more. It's so much fun and everything about it is great. Has so much replay ability too. This is coming from an avid Halo fan, and this is a great step away from the general FPS game and a new way to immerse yourself into the Mario world. Definitely a game to buy, whether or not you're a mario fan.
customer_reviews.author: multichristheman

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this on March 12, 2016 as a present for my kids, they really enjoyed playing the game, my wife liked it too, and the kids spent a lot of time trying to pass all the levels. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Meow!
customer_reviews.text: 3D World takes everything great about 2D and 3D Mario games and mixes all into one awesome adventure! Play as five characters, and travel through the Sprixie Kingdom to stop Bowser's plans. The game also includes these toad segments where you play as a toad and solve puzzles. Although there are some tedious moments such as the fact that every level has to be played five times to unlock the last world, the game has a great multiplayer and is a blast to play!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reid

customer_reviews.title: This game is overall a fun game for me and my son
customer_reviews.text: This game is overall a fun game for me and my son! I got the Nintendo select version due to the original I had stopped working. I've enjoyed and two player friendly this game is and with such great graphics. :)
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Fun and varied
customer_reviews.text: This game is fun in the same way that monopoly is. It's It's a great game to play alone, and it remains fun for the first little bit when you bring friends into the picture, but bonds are destroyed and families are shattered in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. Fewkes

customer_reviews.title: I have played Mario games in the past and I really feel like they took the simple style of Mario and made ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this game!! I have played Mario games in the past and I really feel like they took the simple style of Mario and made it more challenging by adding lots of different angles! We recently played this one with two people as well and I'd recommend it as relationship building, trying to work together and talk to make it through the level.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a Mario fan you will love this game. The 3D aspect is a bit different and more challenging if you are used to the side scrollers. The new cat costume and fun couch co-op play make this a must have game for the Wii U! For some reason, Mario never gets old!
customer_reviews.author: cldsk

customer_reviews.title: One of the greatest Mario games that you can play
customer_reviews.text: One of the greatest Mario games that you can play. This game is amazing epecially if you are looking for something to broadcast on Twitch, Facebook or Youtube. Lamentably Nintendo does not allow to broadcasters to monetizes the gameplays.

customer_reviews.title: Received defective
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped working after plying I’d for a couple of minutes. Only partial refund by company despite this. Purchased same through Nintendo and works great with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: shes 8 and is always wanting me to play video games with her (which I struggle with) but this is so much fun and we can play at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter at Christmas, shes 8 and is always wanting me to play video games with her (which I struggle with) but this is so much fun and we can play at the same time!

customer_reviews.title: Best Mario Game?
customer_reviews.text: Fun and accessible, but challenging enough to please me (a big Nintendo/Mario fan). My wife and I are having a great time getting all the green stars on stream. Little quirks make this a charming game, and all the new power-ups/abilities are satisfying.

customer_reviews.title: I 100% Recommend this!!
customer_reviews.text: This game is amazing! Fun for everyone, the quality of the game is awesome, so many unlockable secrets, and a great soundtrack!!! If you're a fan of Super Mario (and you haven't already got this), YOU SHOULD BUY THIS!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun...boomerang suit is the best
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! Fun, creative levels, and easy to play. Multiplayer is awesome but can get a little chaotic with 4 people. Best for 2 players. A great mario game like so many of the others. Only complain would be that the game was a little short, as we're the levels, but still a blast.

product_meta.title: Nintendo Selects: Super Mario 3D World
product_meta.description: Nintendo Selects highlights a variety of great games at a great price, including this one. For the first time ever, Nintendo has created a four-player Mario game set in a 3D world. The game, developed by the same team that created Super Mario 3D Land for Nintendo 3DS and the Super Mario Galaxy games for Wii, lets up to four players play as Mario, Luigi, Princess Peach and Toad. Each character has his or her own unique characteristics, and people can play cooperatively or competitively. The new cat transformation turns characters into adorable felines that can scratch enemies and even scamper up the flagpole at the end of levels. Clear warp pipes add some new puzzle elements to game play.
feature_bullets: Each character has unique abilities and play styles. For example, Princess Peach glides over gaps, while Luigi has his trademark extra-high jump.
The new cat transformation allows players to run on all fours, pounce on enemies, attack in midair, or use their claws to scamper up walls and goal poles.
Explore colorful 3D environments filled with obstacles and contraptions like transparent pipes and vertical conveyor belts, which add new puzzle elements.
Use the Wii U Gamepad Controller's touch screen to search for hidden blocks and freeze enemies in place.

specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
